title: Web developers challenge Apple to allow other browser engines on iOS
content:
Apple has been facing multiple accusations of anti-competitive practices in recent years, and it seems that there’s more to come. This time, a group of developers has launched a project called “Open Web Advocacy” that challenges Apple to allow other browser engines on iOS.

more…

The post Web developers challenge Apple to allow other browser engines on iOS appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: A group of developers has launched a project called "Open Web Advocacy" that challenges Apple to allow other browser engines on iOS.
